description: Erection of a side dormer roof extension to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of a side dormer roof extension to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The scale bar in the existing and proposed front and rear elevations is incorrect, it measures to 10m instead of 5m in 1:50 scale as stated. Please amend the existing and proposed  front and rear elevations with correct scale bar.

The application seeks approval of the details required by Conditions 4 (Fire Safety Strategy) and 6 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 24/00550/CREG3 granted on 22.10.24. Condition 4 requires the submission of a Fire Safety Strategy. The Applicant has submitted a Fire Strategy Report. The report provides details on evacuation routes, fire warning systems, internal and external fire resilience measures, fire protection systems, fire safety management. Officers are satisfied with the details submitted and confirm it would uphold the fire safety in compliance with Policy D12 of the London Plan 2021. The Applicant has submitted a Construction Management Plan to discharge Condition 6. The Council's Neighbourhood Traffic Engineer has reviewed the plan and considers the CMP to provide a satisfactory level of detail and recommends Condition 6 be discharged. Officers conclude the details submitted to discharge Condition 4 (Fire Safety Strategy) and Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 24/00550/CREG3 are acceptable.
